Control Name: Identifies Information Specifications—The entity identifies information specifications required to support the use of products and services.

control_attributes.Control: Identifies Information Specifications—The entity identifies information specifications required to support the use of products and services.
control_attributes.SubCategory: PI1.1 The entity obtains or generates, uses, and communicates relevant, quality information regarding the objectives related to processing, including definitions of data processed and product and service specifications, to support the use of products and services.
